code: import{RoomDimmerPreset}from'./RoomDimmerPreset';import{RoomWidgetUpdateEvent}from'./RoomWidgetUpdateEvent';export class RoomWidgetUpdateDimmerEvent extends RoomWidgetUpdateEvent{constructor(type){super(type);this._selectedPresetId=0;this._presets=void 0;this._presets=[];}get presetCount(){return this._presets.length;}get presets(){return this._presets;}get selectedPresetId(){return this._selectedPresetId;}set selectedPresetId(k){this._selectedPresetId=k;}setPresetValues(id,type,color,brightness){const preset=new RoomDimmerPreset(id,type,color,brightness);this._presets[id-1]=preset;}getPresetNumber(id){return this._presets[id];}}RoomWidgetUpdateDimmerEvent.PRESETS='RWUDE_PRESETS';RoomWidgetUpdateDimmerEvent.HIDE='RWUDE_HIDE';
